name: Kulki Amiga
description:
Simple puzzle game. Player have to create line of 5 or more balls. Lines can be created horizontally, vertically and diagonally. To move a ball,  ball must have access to target field.

Scoring: 

5 balls - 10 points

6 balls - 14 points

7 balls - 18 points

Requirements:

Any Amiga with 1.3 kick. 512 kB chip memory.

Game was created using ACE: https://github.com/AmigaPorts/ACE
